text: Mangifera casturi (also called Kalimantan mango or kasturi) is a species of plant in the family Anacardiaceae. It was endemic to Kalimantan region of Borneo, Indonesia, but is now considered extinct in the wild. ==References== ==External links== * Article about Mangifera casturi casturi Category:Extinct plants Category:Endemic flora of Borneo Category:Flora of Kalimantan Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Mangifera casturi
